title: domora
author: domora
content: You will receive a license key that you can redeem on the website redeem.microsoft.comThe duration of the subscription is 12 months. You can use your existing Microsoft account. The keys are legally purchased.Price: 35$Payment with LTC is preferred. Other cryptos on request.If this offer is well received, I will gladly add an AutoBuy link later. For now, just msg me if you are interested!

comments.body: Are there discounts for bulk purchases? Can you give one of your live chat tools?

comments.author: black19
comments.body: I see that you're looking for Office 365 personal key for 1 year. I can provide it for $35. It's legit, official from Microsoft distributor. I accept escrow but you pay the fee. Let me know if you're interested. My email dinamargareta2000@gmail.com Thank you
